ing: 1 pinch ground cinnamon, or more to taste
des: "My brother taught me this when he came home from college. I LOVED it and have been telling the world since!"
ins: Place orange slice between forefinger and thumb of left hand. Lick the skin just below thumb of left hand and sprinkle with a pinch of cinnamon. Place shot of tequila in right hand. Lick cinnamon, drink shot, and bite orange slice.
